paper_title: Deep learning accelerated phase prediction of refractory multi-principal element alloys

claims.claim: The 〖ΔH〗_mix distribution of falsely classified Ti alloys with simultaneous BCC, B2, and Laves phases extend beyond the minimum–maximum range observed in the Ti-free training dataset, indicating out-of-distribution behavior relative to the Ti-free distribution
instruction: The notebook loads the trained MLP model and the testing dataset and performs multi-label phase prediction
It then loads the training dataset from the first fold and identifies samples exhibiting simultaneous BCC, B2, and Laves phases
The notebook filters Ti alloys exhibiting simultaneous BCC, B2, and Laves phases that are not correctly predicted by the MLP.
It plots the distributions of 〖ΔH〗_mix for (left) the training samples and (right) the falsely classified Ti alloys
